data.name: DefaultAccountAlreadyActivatedHtmlBody
data.value:
Hi {{User.PreferredName}},

An attempt was recently made to create a new customer account for {{Organisation.Name}} using this email address.

If this attempt was made by yourself, please note that you already have an activated {{Organisation.Name}} customer account and do not have to create a new one. If you have forgotten the password to your account, you can request an email with a link to reset your password using the "Forgot password?" function on our portal login page.

If you did not attempt to create a new user account, you do not have to take any further action. The person who attempted to create the new account is unable to access any information about you or your user account, including the fact that it even exists.

This email was generated automatically. Please do not reply.

data.name: DefaultAccountAlreadyActivatedTextBody
data.value:
Hi {{User.PreferredName}},
An attempt was recently made to create a new customer account for {{User.PreferredName}} using this email address.
If this attempt was made by yourself, please note that you already have an activated {{User.PreferredName}} customer account and do not have to create a new one. If you have forgotten the password to your account, you can request an email with a link to reset your password using the "Forgot password?" function on our portal login page.
If you did not attempt to create a new user account, you do not have to take any further action. The person who attempted to create the new account is unable to access any information about you or your user account, including the fact that it even exists.
This email was generated automatically. Please do not reply.

data.name: DefaultActivationHtmlBody
data.value:
Hi {{User.PreferredName}},

An account has been created for you on the {{Organisation.Name}} portal.

If you would like to activate your account, please click the link below and select a password to complete your account creation.

{{UserActivation.Link}}

If you do not want to activate your account, or if you believe you have received this message in error, please ignore this email.

This is an automated message. Please do not reply to this email.

data.name: DefaultActivationPlainTextBody
data.value:
Hi {{User.PreferredName}},
An account has been created for you on the {{Organisation.Name}} portal. If you would like to activate your account, please click the link below and select a password to complete your account creation.
{{UserActivation.Link}}
If you do not want to activate your account, or if you believe you have received this message in error, please ignore this email. This is an automated message. Please do not reply to this email.

data.name: DefaultPasswordExpiredHtmlBody
data.value:
Hi {{User.PreferredName}},

The password associated with your user account on the {{Organisation.Name}} portal recently expired.

In order to continue to access the {{Organisation.Name}} portal, you must set a new password for your user account using the link below:

{{PasswordExpiredReset.Link}}

If you believe that this email was sent to you in error, please ignore this email.

This is an automated message. Please do not reply to this email.

data.name: DefaultPasswordExpiredPlainTextBody
data.value:
Hi {{User.PreferredName}},
The password associated with your user account on the {{Organisation.Name}} portal recently expired. In order to continue to access the {{Organisation.Name}} portal, you must set a new password for your user account using the link below:
{{PasswordExpiredReset.Link}}
If you believe that this email was sent to you in error, please ignore this email. This is an automated message. Please do not reply to this email.

data.name: DefaultPasswordResetHtmlBody
data.value:
Hi {{User.PreferredName}},

A request has been made to reset the password to your account on the {{Organisation.Name}} portal.

If you have made this request, please follow the link below to complete the process.

{{PasswordReset.Link}}

If you have not made this request, please ignore this email.

This is an automated message. Please do not reply to this email.

data.name: DefaultPasswordResetPlainTextBody
data.value:
Hi {{User.PreferredName}},
A request has been made to reset the password to your account on the {{Organisation.Name}} portal. If you have made this request, please follow the link below to complete the process.
{{PasswordReset.Link}}
If you have not made this request, please ignore this email. This is an automated message. Please do not reply to this email.

data.name: DefaultQuoteAssociationInvitationHtmlBody
data.value:
Hi {{ User.PreferredName }},

A quote was created recently using your email address. If you created this quote and you could like to associate it with your {{ Organisation.Name }} account, please click this link.

If you did not create this quote, or if you would prefer not to associate your new quote with your {{ Tenant.Name }} account, please ignore this email.

This is an automated message. Please do not reply to this email.

data.name: DefaultQuoteAssociationInvitationTextBody
data.value:
Hi {{ User.PreferredName }},
A quote was created recently using your email address. If you created this quote and you could like to associate it with your {{ Organisation.Name }} account, please follow the link below.
{{ QuoteCustomerAssociation.Link }}
If you did not create this quote, or if you would prefer not to associate your new quote with your {{ Tenant.Name }} account, please ignore this email.
This is an automated message. Please do not reply to this email.

data.name: DefaultRenewalInvitationHtmlBody
data.value:
Hi {{User.PreferredName}},

Your policy {{Policy.Number}} will expire on {{Policy.ExpiryDate}}.

To remain covered you will need to renew your policy before the expiry date.

If you would like to renew your policy, please log into our portal using the link below and follow the instructions.

{{PolicyRenewal.Link}}

If you do not want to renew your policy, or if you believe you have received this message in error, please ignore this email.

This is an automated message. Please do not reply to this email.

data.name: DefaultRenewalInvitationTextBody
data.value:
Hi {{User.PreferredName}},
Your policy {{Policy.Number}} will expire on {{Policy.ExpiryDate}}. To remain covered you will need to renew your policy before the expiry date. If you would like to renew your policy, please log into our portal using link below and follow the instructions. {{PolicyRenewal.Link}} If you do not want to activate your account, or if you believe you have received this message in error, please ignore this email. This is an automated message. Please do not reply to this email.
